Title: First Reformed
Actors: Ethan Hawke, Amanda Seyfried, Cedric the Entertainer, Victoria Hill
Plot: A minister of a small congregation in upstate New York grapples with mounting despair brought on by tragedy, worldly concerns and a tormented past.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 61 wins & 102 nominations.
Production: Killer Films, Fibonacci Films, Omeira Studio Partners
